user_query: I want to surprise my parents with a home-cooked dinner and need some recipe ideas. Can you provide me with the nutritional analysis for a chicken stir-fry recipe? Additionally, I'm curious to know the ideal weight for someone who is 190 cm tall.

TaskList.description: Gather recipe ideas for a chicken stir-fry.
Perform nutritional analysis for the chicken stir-fry recipe obtained in Step 1.
Calculate the ideal weight for someone who is 190 cm tall.
